backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing PWA-related features, associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for various frontend components and pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining light/dark theme CSS variables and global styling.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry including PWA meta tags, manifest link, icons, and script loader.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: Web App Manifest defining PWA metadata, start behavior, theme colors, and app icons.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing precache, runtime caching, and offline strategies excluding video files.
frontend/src/App.tsx: React root app configuring TanStack Router routes and theme provider.
frontend/src/components/ChannelHeader.ts: Channel header UI displaying channel details and follow button.
frontend/src/components/CommentSection.t: Comment section with posting form, identity check, and comment list rendering.
frontend/src/components/FollowButton.tsx: Toggle follow state with mock async call and Internet Identity login fallback.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar with search, upload, and identity-based user menu.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Wraps the app with header, sidebar, and routed main content area.
frontend/src/components/Sidebar.tsx: Navigation sidebar listing main app sections with active-state styling.
frontend/src/components/VideoCard.tsx: Displays a video thumbnail, metadata, and links to video and channel pages.
frontend/src/components/VideoPlayer.tsx: Placeholder video player showing offline or default UI states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages authenticated or anonymous backend actors with react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for managing Internet Identity login state and persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React-query hooks for videos and follow actions, currently using placeholders.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and theme CSS variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/followCopy.ts: Centralized UI copy for follow-related labels and formatting.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility to merge Tailwind class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point wiring React, Internet Identity provider, and react-query.
frontend/src/pages/ChannelPage.tsx: Renders a channel header and mock video list, checking if the channel is the user's own.
frontend/src/pages/FollowingPage.tsx: Displays followed-channel videos or a sign‑in prompt, using mock data and conditional UI states.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the home feed with a static list of mock videos displayed in a grid.
frontend/src/pages/LibraryPage.tsx: Shows uploaded and liked videos for signed‑in users, with tabbed navigation and mock data.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Implements a multi‑section settings UI with stateful controls for general, playback, privacy, and notification preferences.
frontend/src/pages/UploadPage.tsx: Provides a video upload form requiring sign‑in and simulates an upload before navigating home.
frontend/src/pages/WatchPage.tsx: Displays a video player, metadata, like/dislike logic, offline alerts, and a mock comments section.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers, unregisters, and checks status of service workers with environment checks and update handling.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, extended theme colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project state, summarizing implemented features for a YouTube‑like app including UI shell, auth, video handling, browsing, interactions, profiles, following, and library.
